section.section: The Committee shall consist of 7 members appointed by the Board.

Of the 7 Committee members:
3 shall be licensed physicians;
3 shall be licensed physician assistants; and
1 shall be a consumer.

Of the licensed physician members:
At least 1 shall specialize in general surgery or a surgical subspecialty;
At least 1 shall specialize in internal medicine, family practice, or a similar primary care specialty; and
1 shall be a Board member.

The Board shall appoint the physician assistant members from a list of names submitted by:
The Maryland Academy of Physician Assistants; and
The State institutions of higher education with approved physician assistant programs.
Each member of the Committee shall be a resident of the State.

text.section: Of the three physician members of the Committee, two shall be previously or currently serving as supervising physicians of a physician assistant under a Board-approved delegation agreement.

section.section: The physician assistant members shall be licensed as a physician assistant under this title.
The physician assistant members shall be currently practicing as a physician assistant or employed as a faculty member of an accredited physician assistant program.

Of the 3 physician assistant members of the Committee:
At least 1 shall be currently practicing in a hospital; and
At least 1 shall be currently practicing in a nonhospital setting.

text.section: A Committee chairperson and a secretary shall be selected every 2 years by a majority vote of the membership of the Committee.
The chairperson shall serve in an advisory capacity to the Board as a representative of the Committee.
